channel.title: Where do we stand?
channel.description: Just curious where we are at with this project as of late. Schools been eating up a lot of my time but I still want to help and id rather not re-invent the wheel.

item.title: Where do we stand?

item.title: Where do we stand?
item.dc:creator: @yakman yakman
item.description:
@yakman wrote:

i dont like the entity -> character -> player setup ether
apparantly theres a class called Item which extends entity on ollie’s setup, but i just dont see an Item being an Entity

also, Character interfears with java.lang.Character
couldnt we just call them the same names as the old aryan deobs

by the way, does anyone know how an updator should be set out, my one was just one class which has loads of ‘addXXX’ methods, like psb’s one, im guessing thats not so good

Read full topic

eehhhhh wtf i dont think ollie has half a fkn clue what hes doing

item.title: Where do we stand?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Hmm, come to think of it you may be right, I’ll have to look.

edit:
Entity extends NodeSub
Character extends Entity
Player extends Character
NPC extends Character

So it’s more like the grand-parent class of Player and NPC

Read full topic

i assumed thats what character is :\

item.title: Where do we stand?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“frank_, post:8, topic:139006”] com.cherokee.rs.rs2.hooks.Entity - the fuck is this meant to be? [/quote]

That is the superclass of NPC and Player, pd called it Entity, I vote we should call it Denizen simply because it sounds so awesome.

Read full topic

item.title: Where do we stand?
item.dc:creator: @frank frank_
item.description:
@frank wrote:

where the fk is it in the svn

edit: i found it

com.cherokee.rs.rs2.hooks.StringWrapper - MutableString com.cherokee.rs.rs2.hooks.Monster - NPC com.cherokee.rs.rs2.hooks.MonsterComposite - NPCDefinition com.cherokee.rs.rs2.hooks.Player - Player com.cherokee.rs.rs2.hooks.Model - Model (i assume he means the actual model class, not some other shitty thing) com.cherokee.rs.rs2.hooks.Animable - Modelled (though likely to change) com.cherokee.rs.rs2.hooks.Stream - ByteStream com.cherokee.rs.rs2.hooks.Character - Mobile com.cherokee.rs.rs2.hooks.Interface - JagexFrame (or something similar, using Interface for an identifier is made of fail) com.cherokee.rs.rs2.hooks.Client com.cherokee.rs.rs2.hooks.Item com.cherokee.rs.rs2.hooks.WorldController - World (world will suffice, might change it to universe) com.cherokee.rs.rs2.hooks.Ground - Tile com.cherokee.rs.rs2.hooks.ObjectDefinition - WhateverTheHellItReallyIs (i havent looked into these in depth, but i believe they contain the inertial space data) com.cherokee.rs.rs2.hooks.ObjectDefinition com.cherokee.rs.rs2.hooks.ObjectDefinition com.cherokee.rs.rs2.hooks.ObjectDefinition com.cherokee.rs.rs2.hooks.ObjectDefinition com.cherokee.rs.rs2.hooks.Entity - the fuck is this meant to be? com.cherokee.rs.rs2.hooks.NodeSub com.cherokee.rs.rs2.hooks.Node com.cherokee.rs.rs2.hooks.NodeList

mopar, when you browse the forums, please get on irc

Read full topic

item.title: Where do we stand?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Same place we were when we last talked, you have the AccessorMethods that needs tweaking, and my ollie parser (get ollie’s updater output from speljohan), frank_ was working on an updater of our own, don’t know how far he is along.

We can use the assembla SVN for this until we get nearer to releasing it.
